SamPy.bolshoi.plotstellarmfÂ¶

A few functions to plot stellar mass functions from SAM runs.

author:Sami-Matias Niemi
version:0.1
contact:niemi@stsci.edu

Functions

main(redshifts, path, database, ...) Driver function, call this with a path to the data,
stellarmassfuncSinglePlot(path, database, ...) Plots a stellar mass function and compares to observational data.
stellarmassfunc_plot(path, database, ...[, ...]) Plots stellar mass functions as a function of redshift.

Classes

FormatStrFormatter(fmt) Use a format string to format the tick
LogLocator([base, subs, numdecs]) Determine the tick locations for log axes
MultipleLocator([base]) Set a tick on every integer that is multiple of base in the
NullFormatter Always return the empty string
